Request Session (New or Exists)

Request:
-> ACQ[SESSIONTIMEOUT][REMOTEIP]\0
-> ACQ[SESSIONTIMEOUT][REMOTEIP][SESSIONID]\0

-> ACQ\SHORT\INT\0
-> ACQ\SHORT\INT\BYTE\CHARS{BYTEVALUELENGTH}\0

Response:
<- 1[SESSIONID][EXPIREDATE]\0
<- 2\0 // Only one possible reason can be that is SessionCreationException

<- \BYTE\BYTE\CHARS{BYTEVALUELENGTH}\LONG\0
<- \BYTE\0

Request Session Value

Request:
-> GET[KEY]\0

-> GET\BYTE\CHARS{BYTEVALUELENGTH}\0

Response:
<- [KEY][VALUE]\0

<- \BYTE\CHARS{BYTEVALUELENGTH}\INTEGER\BYTES{INTEGERVALUELENGTH}\0

Set Session Value 

Request:
-> SET[KEY][VALUE]\0

-> SET\BYTE\CHARS{BYTEVALUELENGTH}\INTEGER\BYTES{INTEGERVALUELENGTH}\0

Response:
<- 1\0 // Currently any other possible response.

<- \BYTE\0

Get All Registered Keys

Request:
-> KYS\0

Response:

<- [KEY][KEY][KEY]...\0

<- \BYTE\CHARS{BYTEVALUELENGTH}\BYTE\CHARS{BYTEVALUELENGTH}\BYTE\CHARS{BYTEVALUELENGTH}...\0

Close Connection
-> \0
